mapper.select: select * from ma_lifecycle_gate a order by a.GATETYPE,a.fromphase
select * from ma_lifecycle_gate a WHERE GUID=#GUID#
mapper.insert:
insert into ma_lifecycle_gate (guid, detailfk, gatetype, fromphase, classname,
actionname,
createuserguid, createtime, updateuserguid, updatetime) values (#GUID:VARCHAR#, #DETAILFK:VARCHAR#, #GATETYPE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #FROMPHASE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CLASSNAME:VARCHAR:NULL#,
#ACTIONNAME:VARCHAR:NULL#,
#CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#)
mapper.update:
update ma_lifecycle_gate
detailfk = #DETAILFK#, GATETYPE = #GATETYPE#, fromphase = #FROMPHASE#, classname = #CLASSNAME#, actionname = #ACTIONNAME#,
updatetime = #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, updateuserguid = #UPDATEUSERGUID# where guid = #GUID#
